categories: Category:Jedi Consulars of the Jedi Order
Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Arias was a Human male Jedi Master who served the Jedi Order during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the resurgent Sith Empire. Originally a Jedi Consular before he achieved the rank of Master, Arias was stationed on Nar Shaddaa. From his small base on the Lower Promenade, he taught visiting Jedi Consulars new skills.
